channel.title: The Mini Pages on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in The Mini Pages on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Trimmed For Space
item.description: _Editor’s note: Tonight’s Tedium is an updated rerun of a classic issue about the stuff that newspapers get rid of when trying to slim down. Unspoken in this article: Usually, the final step of this process is people. And with the recent sagas of L.A. Weekly and (on the digital side of things) DNAinfo, now felt like a good time to revisit. (If you’ve read before, keep reading; there’s a new section on newsprint.
